text: Lala Pot is a must-try! The soup base is incredibly delicious, and they offer a fantastic variety of ingredients to choose from. What really elevates the experience is the impressive selection of chili and sauces, ensuring there's something to please every palate. Oh, and don't leave without trying their fried chicken – it's absolutely delicious!

MUST VISIT LALA CLAYPOT IN SG! premium snow beef and australian beef quality for $10.80-$15.80. Black pork was so good as well for $10.80. will definitely go back.
They also use SHARK BONE AND FRESH SEAFOOD in their broth! loved it
Found this place on Google Map and decided to give them a try. We were not disappointed. The Lala soup was sweet and very yummy. The ingredients was fresh and portion were quite generous

If you’re in the area or not it’s definitely a place you want to try. The charcoal hotpot, the quality of the ingredient used, the most friendly staff, it all adds to the great experience. Expect that the costs are very reasonable, the staff always helpful and there a tonne of condiment like chilli, sesame oil etc that is on offer for you to make sauce.

A must visit and eat for sure

Felt bloated the whole after dinner here and vomitted the next morning and fell sick with fever and diarrhea. Actually the lala hotpot soup was nice but this experience won't make me wanna go back again. Could be hygiene issue that you need a strong stomach to eat here :(
